about_the_game:
KILL KILL KILL KILL is a high-octane arena shooter where you play as a relentless space warrior tasked with destroying invaders from the far reaches of space. These enemies aim to eradicate all life and seize control, but you are the only obstacle in their path to domination. Arm yourself with a variety of powerful weapons, dive into the fray, and shred through hordes of enemies. Your mission is to obliterate these cosmic threats and ensure the survival of all living beings.



Key Features:
  • High-Intensity Combat: Fast-paced action with relentless enemy waves.
  • Diverse Arsenal: Wide range of weapons to decimate your foes.
  • Cosmic Invaders: Battle against unique and formidable space enemies.
  • Last Line of Defense: You are the sole barrier against cosmic domination.
  • Explosive Gameplay: Tear through enemies with destructive power and skill.
detailed_description:
KILL KILL KILL KILL is a high-octane arena shooter where you play as a relentless space warrior tasked with destroying invaders from the far reaches of space. These enemies aim to eradicate all life and seize control, but you are the only obstacle in their path to domination. Arm yourself with a variety of powerful weapons, dive into the fray, and shred through hordes of enemies. Your mission is to obliterate these cosmic threats and ensure the survival of all living beings.



Key Features:
  • High-Intensity Combat: Fast-paced action with relentless enemy waves.
  • Diverse Arsenal: Wide range of weapons to decimate your foes.
  • Cosmic Invaders: Battle against unique and formidable space enemies.
  • Last Line of Defense: You are the sole barrier against cosmic domination.
  • Explosive Gameplay: Tear through enemies with destructive power and skill.
name: KILL KILL KILL KILL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 110 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: KILL KILL KILL KILL - Intense arena shooter featuring a space warrior annihilating invaders from the distant cosmos. You're the last line of defense against their domination. Destroy them with diverse weapons, tearing through hordes of enemies.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Azerbaijani, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Afrikaans, Basque, Belarusian, Bangla, Bosnian, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Dari, Zulu, Hebrew, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, Yoruba, Kazakh, Kannada, Catalan, Quechua, Kinyarwanda, K'iche', Konkani, Xhosa, Khmer, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Serbian, Sotho, Sinhala, Sindhi, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Uzbek, Uyghur, Urdu, Filipino, Hausa, Hindi, Croatian, Cherokee, Scots, Estonian
